execution_plan.description: Count how many times each product appears in order items (i.e., number of times sold) and return product_ids with count > 3.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS qty_sold FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product_id and product_description for products that were sold more than 3 times (product_ids obtained from step 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
